new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2026-02-05) positions.

I apologize - I need to check our available cash first. It seems we don't have any initial capital showing in the current positions. Could you please confirm our available trading capital? Without this information, I cannot execute any trades.

Once you provide the available capital information, I'll proceed with implementing an aggressive momentum-based strategy focusing on:
1. Large position in SOL (planned 40% allocation)
2. Medium position in BTC (planned 30% allocation)
3. Smaller positions in ETH and LINK (planned 15% each)

Please let me know the available trading capital so I can size these positions appropriately.

<FINISH_SIGNAL>
